features.title: Custom Furniture
features.description: Each piece is handcrafted to your specifications, using the finest hardwoods and traditional joinery techniques that will last for generations.

features.title: Woodworking Classes
features.description: Learn the art of woodworking in our beginner-friendly workshops. From basic skills to advanced joinery, our master craftsmen will guide you through creating your own pieces.

features.title: Restoration Services
features.description: Bring new life to your treasured wooden heirlooms. Our restoration experts can repair, refinish, and revitalize antique furniture while preserving its character and history.
